creator: Murcianys
descriptionHtml:
Chat Murcianys is a free messaging application that allows you to join public radio chats and request songs while you listen to their music. You can also message privately with your friends who are currently using the app. Radio station owners can add their radio station and allow their audience to chat, listen to music, and request their favorite songs.

Create an account with an email and any password of your choice, and you can choose to upload a profile image. Once you're logged in, you won't have to log back in unless you log out.

Current features:

⦿ Private Chats: search for and chat with friends who are currently using the app. Send free text, voice, photos, and video messages. Free international voice and video calls using your internet connection. ⭑

⦿ Radio Chats: Join a public radio station to chat with the current radio host, other radio listeners and request your favorite songs. You can opt to receive notifications from the radio station or opt out.

⦿ If you own a radio station(s), you can quickly add your station and connect with your audience. You can then manage your radio(s) and make any changes if needed.

✪ New features such as Murcianys Live (Live video streaming) and sharing status/history will be added soon. Feel free to email us with any feedback, questions, or concerns at: murcianyshn@gmail.com

Thank you for your support!

⭑Data charges may apply. Contact your Internet provider.
descriptionShort: Listen and chat with your favorite radio stations.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We may release various updates throughout the day to provide you with the best experience when using Chat Murcianys. Below are the changes we have made:

*Fixed update notifications
*Keep notifications when using multiple accounts on mutiple devices
*Improved notifications for radio stations
*Added letter to profiles without a profile image
*Improved searching

Thank you for your support!

Chat Murcianys is a free messaging application that allows you to join public radio chats and request songs while you listen to their music. You can also message privately with your friends who are currently using the app. Radio station owners can add their radio station and allow their audience to chat, listen to music, and request their favorite songs.

Create an account with an email and any password of your choice, and you can choose to upload a profile image. Once you're logged in, you won't have to log back in unless you log out.

Current features:

⦿ Private Chats: search for and chat with friends who are currently using the app. Send free text, voice, photos, and video messages. Free international voice and video calls using your internet connection. ⭑

⦿ Radio Chats: Join a public radio station to chat with the current radio host, other radio listeners and request your favorite songs. You can opt to receive notifications from the radio station or opt out.

⦿ If you own a radio station(s), you can quickly add your station and connect with your audience. You can then manage your radio(s) and make any changes if needed.

✪ New features such as Murcianys Live (Live video streaming) and sharing status/history will be added soon. Feel free to email us with any feedback, questions, or concerns at: murcianyshn@gmail.com

Thank you for your support!

⭑Data charges may apply. Contact your Internet provider.

title: ChatMurcianys

creator: Murcianys
descriptionHtml:
Chat Murcianys is a free messaging application for radio stations, podcasts, friends, and family.

Join public chat rooms and meet people with similar interests and/or message privately with your friends who are currently using the app. If you would like to help grow our community and your audience, register you radio station or podcast with us.

All you need to do is create an account with an email and any password of your choice, and you can choose to upload a profile image. Once you're logged in, you won't have to log back in unless you choose to log out.

Current features:

⦿ Private Chats: search for and chat with friends who are currently using the app. Send free text, voice, photos, and video messages. Free international voice and video calls using your internet connection. ⭑

⦿ Radio Chats: Join a public radio station to chat with the current radio host, other radio listeners, and request your favorite songs. You can opt to receive notifications from the radio station or opt out.

⦿ If you own a radio station(s), you can quickly register it within our app. Once approved, you can manage your radio(s) and make any changes if needed.

⦿ Podcast chats: Listen to your favorite podcast and chat with other listeners within the chat room. If you have a podcast, register it to grow your audience.

⦿Join or start a live video in a radio station's chat room

⦿Translate any text message in any chat room

✪ Feel free to email us with any feedback, questions, or concerns at: murcianyshn@gmail.com

Thank you for your support!

⭑Data charges may apply. Contact your Internet provider.

Join public chat rooms and meet people with similar interests and/or message privately with your friends who are currently using the app. If you would like to help grow our community and your audience, register you radio station or podcast with us.

All you need to do is create an account with an email and any password of your choice, and you can choose to upload a profile image. Once you're logged in, you won't have to log back in unless you choose to log out.

Current features:

⦿ Private Chats: search for and chat with friends who are currently using the app. Send free text, voice, photos, and video messages. Free international voice and video calls using your internet connection. ⭑

⦿ Radio Chats: Join a public radio station to chat with the current radio host, other radio listeners, and request your favorite songs. You can opt to receive notifications from the radio station or opt out.

⦿ If you own a radio station(s), you can quickly register it within our app. Once approved, you can manage your radio(s) and make any changes if needed.

⦿ Podcast chats: Listen to your favorite podcast and chat with other listeners within the chat room. If you have a podcast, register it to grow your audience.

⦿Join or start a live video in a radio station's chat room

⦿Translate any text message in any chat room

✪ Feel free to email us with any feedback, questions, or concerns at: murcianyshn@gmail.com

Thank you for your support!

⭑Data charges may apply. Contact your Internet provider.
descriptionShort: Listen and chat with your favorite radio stations.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New features:
•Fixed errors when removing live video
•Improved song request design

If any errors arise: email us at info@chatmurcianys.com
We may release various updates throughout the day to provide you with the best experience when using ChatMurcianys.
